txt.en: 'The Trév Dúvardain -- the Hill-men who ally with Angmar? Aye, I can see now why Aighrig would shroud her actions from us. Still, if the Angmarim are hunting her down, her alliances are clear. We ought to help her.'
Rékkur is waiting for you at Annâk-khurfu.\n\nHe will want to hear about the Angmarim orders you found.
The scout has orders from Latharn to capture Aighrig for betraying the Trév Dúvardain
Scouts of the Iron Crown have been seen spying on Annâk-khurfu.

'Soon after we began investigating Gáfin's death, scouts reported Angmarim activity nearby. The Angmarim appear to be searching for something, but can't venture close enough without meeting the pointy end of a dwarf-blade. They're too craven to attack us openly, but they aren't welcome!\n\n'I'd wager a couple have settled themselves behind Annâk-khurfu, while others watch the path leading up here. You won't have to look far. Find out why they're skulking around -- while getting rid of them, of course.'

Rékkur has asked you to defeat Iron Crown scouts on the outskirts of Annâk-khurfu and find out what they're searching for.\n\nA couple may be lurking behind Annâk-khurfu, while others watch the path leading up to it.
